#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main(){
	int t;
	cin >> t;
	string a,b;
	for(int tt=1;tt<=t;tt++){
		cin >> a >> b;
		string p = a+'.'+b;
		string q = b+'.'+a;
		int* x1 = new int[p.length()];
		int* x2 = new int[p.length()];
		x1[0]=0;
		x2[0]=0;
		for(unsigned int i=1;i<p.length();i++){
			int y = x1[i-1];
			while(y>0 && p[i]!=p[y])
				y=x1[y-1];
			if(p[i]==p[y]) y++;
			x1[i]=y;
			y=x2[i-1];
			while(y>0 && q[i]!=q[y])
				y=x2[y-1];
			if(q[i]==q[y]) y++;
			x2[i]=y;
		}
		int l=0;
		/*for(int i=0;i<p.length();i++) cout << x1[i] << " ";
		cout << "\n";
		for(int i=0;i<p.length();i++) cout << x2[i] << " ";
		cout << "\n";*/
		for(unsigned int i=a.length()+1;i<p.length();i++){
			if(x1[i]+x2[i] >= i-a.length()) l=i-a.length();
		}
		cout << "Case " << tt << ": " << l << "\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
